Darpa, which is short for defence advanced research projects agency, is the elite blue sky research branch of the american military. They do a lot, and I mean a lot, of robotics funding. Like billions of dollars.
Darpa used to be called ARPA, then the government decided to clarify by adding the term defense to the name.
